metadata.synopsis: Dialog with disgusied redcap in BM. He's in pirate form and bemusedly watching his crewmates as they drunkenly sing sea shanties.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Debugbook option "Act3 → LOW - Auntie Ethel's Revenge → Hag was defeated in Act I"- Talk to S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_DisguisedRedcap_05_357299a8-b8c2-4b99-92f8-761fd697c435

0.speaker: Bert 'The Weasel' Adams
0.text: I think they've emptied half the 'Maid's cellars between them - absolute arse-mongrels.
0.context: NodeContext: shaking his head, bemused. Arse-mongrel is said affectionately.

1.speaker: Bert 'The Weasel' Adams
1.text: The captain is gonna belt the heads off these lads if they keep singing. Stick around - it's gonna be quite the show.
1.context: NodeContext: shaking his head - gesturing to directly in front of him where his crew mates are hammered and singing.
